Hi guys! I am not sure if this is the right channel, but I have question regarding the Workflows.
While setting up a workflow, how can I make the tickets to be reopened by the customer. E.g. when client sends an email to support, ticket gets created and is assigned to agent who then manually responds to client. If the problem is solved, the ticket is closed by an agent, but if it is not how can user reopen it and respond to the same ticket?
